Content: I have a 2001 Suzuki VS800GL intruder, when i got it it was not running off rear carb, cleared gas flow to rear carb,found #2 carb pilot idle screw turned out about 6 turns,reset to 21/2 out engine run ok ,would like to reset to original settings and resycn carbs ,have Clymers Manuel, no actual setting were in manual, does anyone know the proper start point. My Thanks to all the help
Title: Proper Factory idle [pilot jet] setting for 2001 VS800Gl USA east coast
Author: OldGuy79
